entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @realDonaldTrump @GoyaFoods The CEO of Goya was invited to the WH to continue Trump’s Hispanic campaign from yesterday. He said we are blessed to have a leader like Trump. Most Coronavirus cases in the world, Protesters, unemployment at 11.1%. Blessed? #BoycottGoya
